content: materials cascade yarns baby alpaca chunky bulky / 12 ply 100% alpaca 108 yards / 100 grams 8 skeins used in in natural undyed color size 10us/6mm needles finished measurement is roughly the size of an infants crib mattress gauge is not critical for this project but if you get more than 14 stitches over 4 inches your blanket will be slightly larger than the mattress all the better for tucking baby in i used cascade yarns baby alpaca chunky but any soft bulky yarn or even 2 strands of a sport or worsted weight yarn held together will do special stitches mb = make bobble to make a bobble k into the next st but do not remove it from the left needle yo k 2x into the same st then remove 5 st made turn the work and p into all 5 st turn the work k5 turn work p5 turn the work k 5 bind off the 5 stitches you just made by lifting each over the last until only 1st is left continue knitting as normal note before you begin working each row place the yarn forward if the second stitch in the row is a purl or behind if the second stitch is knit before slipping the first stitch it makes a cleaner edge and one that can be easily crochet into if desired using a crochet or long tail cast on method cast on 128stitches row 1 slip the 1st st purlwise k & p across beginning seed pattern border row 2 slip the 1st st purlwise p & k across row 3-10 repeat row 1 & 2 row 11 slip the 1st st k p 2x p120 k p 2x k row 12 slip the 1st st p k 2x k120 p k 2x p row 13 20 repeat row 11 & 12 row 21- slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x p10 k8 6x p10 k p 2x k row 22 - slip the 1st st purlwise p k 2x k10 p8 6x k10 p k 2x p row 23 - slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x *p10 slip 2st purlwise onto a cable needle & place behind work k2 k stitches off the cable needle slip 2st purlwise onto the cable needle & place forward k2 k stitches off the cable* repeat 6x p10 k p 2x k row 24 slip the 1st st purlwise p k 2x * k10 p8 * 6x k10 p k 2x p row 25 slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 k8 * 6x p10 k p 2x k row 26 repeat row 24 row 27 slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 k4 mb k3 p10 k3 mb k4 * 3x p10 k p 2x k row 28 slip the 1st st purlwise p k 2x *k10 p8 * 6x k10 p k 2x p row 29 -
